column4: Is there a way to disable DMA of an installation via a livecd?
you can't install from the live cd
or disable it complete with the boot option dma=off IIRC
is it because you can't boot with dma?
you could edit /boot/grub/menu.lst and add dma=off
I don't know if disabling dma would help, but to do it edit /boot/grub/menu.lst and add dma=off to the kernel line
it will decrease performance considerably though
I don't know. it sure looks bad
Can I do that edit from grub or must I use a livecd?
you can edit from the menu. highlight the entry and press e
the highlight the kernel line and press e again
